document.full_text: tennessee's top investigator on monday made a public plea and governor bill haslam offered a $50,000 reward as authorities pressed for leads in the apparent abduction of 20-year-old nursing student holly bobo five days ago.
document.title: tennessee investigator makes plea for help in bobo case
lines_and_colors: tennessee's top investigator on monday made a public plea and governor bill haslam offered a $50,000 reward as authorities pressed for leads in the apparent abduction of 20-year-old nursing student holly bobo five days ago.
